Like-Like: You Galvatron, is Like-Like right?

> OCC: *cough*bullshit*cough*
> 
>     Galvatron let the spark go. Its febble energy
> didnt affect him at all. Magnus had  al litte affect
> but not much. And showed mercy letting the bots spark
> leave. He held up the body. "I want to use this for
> another reason anyway. I have a friend who will need a
> body. And with a few modifications this will do
> nicely."
> --- Rudra656@... wrote:
> > OOC: Kinger just let him go he's a disembodied
> > spark, he can't bother you.
> > 
> > ::Enertron's Spark::
> >         He "saw," for lack of a better word, the
> > Matrix of war emerging and 
> > flew out the door.  He slowed the beam by using his
> > own energy against it.  
> > His energy was dismally weak and slowed the beam
> > only a tiny amount but it 
> > was enough to get him out of the ship and into the
> > air where no bot, no 
> > matter how godlike, would be able to catch him.
> >
